Posts.Content: Hi Holly Yes don't worry I have total sensation  in the reduced side , feels and looks normal. Scares are healed and you can't even tell the nipple has been moved. Good luck  Hugs  Jan xxxx
Posts.Title: Unhappy with result of reconstruction after radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi Shimmer star , Hope your bad day has passed you by now.  You are towards the end of your treatment and then you can look at asking your surgeons opinion . I also had my mastectomy with reconstruction using an implant in Nov 17. I had a reduction on the other side at the same time . I was pleased with the result  , the nipple was moved upwards to bring it back into normality.  I would recommend this as my reconstruction is much smaller than my original boob. Good luck with your last chemo Your life will soon be all back up and running and you will look back and realise how strong you were. Hugs Jan x
Posts.Title: Unhappy with result of reconstruction after radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi Linn I have also had the reduction.  I had this all done at the same time as the mastectomy in Nov 17. My scares are fading nicely and around the nipple you really can't tell. I am really happy with the results well worth it. Good luck Jan x
Posts.Title: Reduction on non cancer breast experiences please

Posts.Content: Hi Lucy You sound really positive which will get you through all this poop. This site has helped me through,  just reading that everyone is experiencing the same as you and your not on your own. I have completed my chemo now   just got the herceptin injections . My journey like everyone else's has had its up and downs , which is normal but we all get through it to tell the tale.  Good luck with the rest of chemo Stay strong when you can but remember it's ok to have a good cry when needed.  My hair is growing back and it's only 3 weeks since my last chemo.  Jan xxx
